text: @PressSec BUT YOU WON’T SAY BLACK LIVES MATTER. AND you didn’t have that empathy for children locked in cages with Coronavirus or George Floyd or Amaury or Breonna Taylor. “I WILL NEVER LIE BULLSHIT!”
